title: Hour 2: Gimme Jimmy
description:
In this episode, Domonique Foxworth, Courtney Cronin, and Keyshawn Johnson are back to debate who should get the 49ers starting QB gig: Jimmy Garoppolo or Trey Lance? The crew also discusses what NBA teams should watch out for when trading for Kevin Durant. Later in the episode, Courtney, Domonique, and Keyshawn give their takes on whether or not the NBA should incentivize players to play in more of the 82 regular season games. Vince Young joins the show to look back on his performance in the 2006 Rose Bowl against Keyshawn's USC Trojans and offers his perspective on the Longhorns' decision to join the SEC. Also, does Vince think No. 1 recruit Arch Manning will have a big impact on Texas? Plus, why did Courtney walk the full length of the Brooklyn Bridge? Kevin Durant knows the answer.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Who should be the 49ers starting quarterback?
